Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Jenga: Disney Theme Park Edition – Hollywood Tower Hotel
boardgame.description:
You definitely don't want to be the fall guy and bring down this special Hollywood Tower Hotel edition of Jenga. Featuring a colorful assortment of HTH blocks, it's a fun way to elevate your spirits.

Magic in the details
Created especially for Walt Disney World Resort and Disneyland Resort

Includes 54 hardwood Jenga Hollywood Tower Hotel blocks
Includes traditional Jenga and Disney Theme Park Edition rules
Includes loading tray to assemble tower
Part of the Hollywood Tower Hotel Collection

New rules for the Disney Parks Version of the Game include "Thrilling Directives" which ask you to perform feats such as: each player has 10 seconds to remove and place a block, reverse directions, or even pass this block to another player to stack.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Versions & Editions: Disney Theme Park Editions

boardgame.name: The Book of Days
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Dee Sanction is a tabletop role-playing game about serving Queen and country in the late Tudor period, in a time where kingdoms vie for power, the Church splinters under the pressure of reform, and creatures of folklore emerge from enforced hiding seeking revenge against those who imprisoned them.

The Dee Sanction Journal — or The Book of Days — is a blank character record in the style of a bullet-journal, featuring copies of the character sheet plus room to organise and keep notes, including dotted and lined sheets. A 40-page compact book-style PDF (A5, 148 x 210mm/5.8 x 8.3 inches).

boardgame.name: The Huntsman's Isle Adventure Conversion Guide
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

William Cecil has directed Francis Walsingham to send agents to investigate troubled shipping in a remote area. While insignificant of itself, the traffic through the seas in that region carry vital supplies — and there are overtones of supernatural influence in the reports.

The Huntsman's Isle is a novice-level adventure for Shadow of the Demon Lord from Schwalb Entertainment; this is an adventure conversion guide for The Dee Sanction, a standalone game of Elizabethan investigation into supernatural threats against crown and country.

This outline provides basic thoughts, tweaks, and creature conversions designed to support running the Shadow of the Demon Lord adventure of the same name.

You will require a copy of both The Dee Sanction core rules and The Huntsman’s Isle adventure to make the best use of this material. Moreover, a GM can use these notes on rough-and-ready conversion as a guide to their own tinkering with adventures written for other game systems.

boardgame.name: Aqua Nurglis
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Aqua Nurglis is the fifth and penultimate adventure in the Shadows in the Mist campaign. It can be played as part of that campaign or as a standalone adventure.

A terrifying disease spreads through the streets of Anvilgard. At first it affected only the poor, and the Grand Conclave shook their heads at the toll in lives lost but did little to stop it. Now the sickness has erupted across the city and folk, both high and low, fall gravely ill. The source of the sickness must be found, before there is nothing left in Anvilgard but bloating corpses rotting in the streets…

Aqua Nurglis follows the events of Petrified Wood and Crucible of Life and sees a party of Soulbound heroes race to uncover the source of a vile sickness spreading through Anvilgard. All signs point to the Blackscale Coil, a mysterious Aelven cabal that runs the city, but the return of an old rival leads the heroes to uncover an even greater rot at the very heart of Anvilgard.

boardgame.name: Crucible of Life
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Crucible of Life is the third adventure in the Shadows in the Mist campaign. It can be played as part of that campaign or as a standalone adventure.

The last survivor of a doomed expedition stumbles through the streets of Anvilgard, bringing news of a hidden Stormvault and an artefact of incredible power. News spreads quickly, drawing the attention of the Blackscale Coil — a cabal of Aelves that control much of Anvilgard through threats and dark magic. The Grand Conclave can not let them reach it first. Two expeditions race from the city to search for the Stormvault, but they must first fight their way through the deadly jungles of the Crucible of Life.

Crucible of Life follows the events of Rotten to the Core and sees a party of Soulbound heroes venture into the deadly jungles surrounding Anvilgard. The party must lead an expedition of dozens of trackers, hunters, and scholars from the city and fight through poisonous plants and vicious predators to reach the Stormvault in time. But reaching the ancient Stormvault is only the first step of their journey, as they will need to face the guardians that protect the Vault of the Crimson Twins before recovering what is hidden within.

boardgame.name: Petrified Wood
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Petrified Wood is the fourth adventure in the Shadows in the Mist campaign. It can be played as part of that campaign or as a standalone adventure.

The roiling green mists are thick in the harbour tonight. So thick your every breath burns in your lungs and your footsteps are muffled whispers on the pavement. You can barely see your own hands in front of your face, but even through the sense-damping mists, there is no mistaking the shrill cry of shocked horror that fills the air around you. You track the bouncing screams through the dockside mists until a vast shape emerges from the haze. Before you stands a towering Kurnoth Hunter of the Sylvaneth, seemingly unmoving. As you get closer, you see its bark has turned a sickly white and they are frozen in place…

Petrified Wood follows the events of Crucible of Life and Rotten to the Core and see a party of Soulbound heroes tasked with investigating the murder of one of the Sylvaneth that dwell in Anvilgard. The party must speak with the strange coven of Branchwyches that oversee Spireroot — the Sylvaneth’s home high above the mists of Anvilgard — and must do all they can to stop open war in the city. However, the party are being stalked themselves and soon discover that Anvilgard has a serious rat problem…

boardgame.name: Monsters of Aquilae Volume 1 (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Monsters of Aquilae is an enormous bestiary consisting of more than 200 brand-new monsters.

Each of these monsters is designed you can use immediately in any campaign setting and any plot or story.

Each monster features all of the following:

4 complete statblocks
Physical description
Encounter behavior
Story hooks & quest snippets for introducing the monster into your game
Actions and Special Qualities
Environmental description
Lore: Commonly-known information about the monster, as well as Expanded Lore, only available to a PC who passes Knowledge or related checks to uncover the info

boardgame.name: Infernal Tranquility (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A dangerous cult begins to transform a peaceful town into a chaotic haven for madness. Will you stop their machinations or will infernal spirits destroy everything you hold dear? In this adventure players will guide their PCs in the defense of Tradesman’s Root, a small settlement wedged in between a large plateau and a dark forest. Nature, dark forces, and political intrigue all conspire against the PCs to bring the downfall of the once proud townsfolk.

Infernal Tranquility is an adventure for 4-6 3rd level characters, or alternatively, 1st level characters that will advance to 3rd level quickly via milestone achievements. Infernal Tranquility can be used with any 5E fantasy setting the GM desires.

Inside you will find;

A 30 page fantasy adventure, usable with nearly any fantasy setting;
4-10 hours of play, depending on playstyle;
New adversaries;
Choices that matter.

boardgame.name: Kind Folx
KindFolks
KindFolx
boardgame.description: 10 years after being shunned by the monster army for his unorthodox looks, Reinus returns to the city of KindFolx to dismantle it single-handedly in the ultimate quest of spite.

boardgame.name: Ash Walkers
Ashwalkers
boardgame.description: Ashwalkers will be a narrative title in which players will need to keep the characters alive in an effort to navigate a post-apocalyptic landscape.

boardgame.name: Deepest Chamber
boardgame.description: Deepest Chamber is a deck building game with roguelike elements set in a fantasy world where peril lurks at every step.

boardgame.name: Batora: Lost Haven
boardgame.description: The physical and mental balance of a naive and reckless girl who lost everything is the only weapon to save the Earth from oblivion. Jump on a journey across colorful and mesmerizing planets in this fast-paced adventure where your conscience will carry the weight of your decisions.

boardgame.name: She Dreams Elsewhere
boardgame.description: She Dreams Elsewhere is a surreal adventure RPG about dreams and the extent to which they mirror reality.

boardgame.name: Pupperazzi
boardgame.description: Put your love for pups to the test - we have a bunch of dogs that need their photos taken, doggone it! Photograph and catalogue the finest (and derpiest) dogs to build your career, upgrade your camera, and discover new canines.

boardgame.name: Windjammers 2
boardgame.description: The best flying disc game of all time is back! With amazing hand-drawn graphics, crazy new moves, gameplay mechanics and awesome new characters and stages, Windjammers 2 is the sequel you've been dreaming of.

boardgame.name: Rain on Your Parade
boardgame.description: Rain On Your Parade is a slapstick comedy game where you play as a mischievous cloud determined to ruin everybody's day.

boardgame.name: Action Arcade Wrestling
boardgame.description: Perform a BODY SLAM, knock'em down with a CLOTHESLINE, pull off the classic PILEDRIVER AND… shoot LIGHTNING BOLTS into your opponent's face?!

boardgame.name: Jack Axe
boardgame.description: Be Jack! Get an axe! Take Jack (and her sisters) on an axe tossing, single or multiplayer, platforming adventure in a vibrant open world inspired by Filipino and Norse mythology. When It's Shiny and Polished.

boardgame.name: Kitsune Tails
boardgame.description: Run, jump, and dash across a land inspired by Japanese mythology and explore the complicated relationships between kitsune and humans in this follow up to Super Bernie World.

boardgame.name: Severed Steel
boardgame.description: A stylish and visceral single-player FPS featuring a fluid stunt system, destructible voxel environments, loads of bullet time, a unique one-armed protagonist, and a dark electronic soundtrack.

boardgame.name: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows
boardgame.description: A Tale of Shadows redefines the puzzle platformer genre with a unique gameplay and exceptional aesthetics. Help Emma and the teddy bear Fenton solve the mystery of the disappearance of the famous magician Thomas Kane.

boardgame.name: Murder Mystery Machine
boardgame.description: MurderMysteryMachine crosses unique puzzle-solving and deduction gameplay with a narrative that questions the very nature of justice

boardgame.name: Bear Raid
boardgame.description:
In Bear Raid you’ll put on your power suit, pajamas, or prison jumper, and start buying, selling, and shorting stocks. Like every successful trader, your goal is to try and make the most money you can.

Players will buy, sell, and short stocks in the stock market during the action phase of the game. Forecast cards with clever news headlines will be used to determine how each stock is affected.

Through the use of dice that you can manipulate and clever play, you'll influence the market, hopefully bending the stock prices to your advantage.

The winner is the one who's made the most money!

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Whisker Squadron
boardgame.description: Whisker Squadron is a forward-moving aerial shooter with feline pilots and a rogue-like structure. Come listen to Aaron discuss procedurally-generated bosses, etc.

boardgame.name: Chasing Static
boardgame.description: A psychological horror short story. Explore the untouched wilderness of rural Wales as you uncover the forgotten remains of a mysterious facility and find the truth behind the missing villagers of Hearth.

boardgame.name: Figment 2: Creed Valley
boardgame.description: an action-adventure game set in the human mind.

boardgame.name: Fan Erweiterung Auftragskarten 2.0
Fan Expansion Job cards 2.0
boardgame.description:
This is a set of animal tiles and a job card board for 1-6 players. It enables you to use the job cards, if you use the other animals, Aquaretto or even Zooloretto with Aquaretto.
At the end of the game you get extra points for a enclosure with an specific animal and zero minus points for one kind of animal in the barn / depot.

Es ist ein Set aus Tier-Plättchen und einem blanko Auftragskarte für 1-6 Spieler. Es ermöglicht die Nutzung der Auftragskarten, wenn ihr mit anderen Tierarten, Aquaretto oder gar mit Aquaretto spielt. Zum Spiel-Ende erhaltet ihr dann Extrapunkte für Gehege mit übereinstimmenden Tieren und keine Minuspunkte für eine Tierart im Stall / Depot.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Aquaretto
Zooloretto

boardgame.name: Roszada wśród zwierząt
boardgame.description:
Three animals: a cat, a mouse and an elephant roam the fields to get their favorite treats. As much as they want food, they fear each other so much. The mouse runs away from the cat, the cat runs away from the elephant, and the elephant runs away from the mouse. Demonstrate your best strategy to move your animals in this seemingly simple game. Gather the most food to win.

—description from the box (translated)

boardgame.name: Arboria
boardgame.description: Arboria is a dark fantasy 3D rogue-lite game

boardgame.name: RAWMEN
boardgame.description: Channel your inner souperiority and unleash culinary devastation for good.

boardgame.name: Chenso Club
boardgame.description: Chenso Club is a group of girls-turned-fighters who are using the aliens' life force to beat them at their own game:

boardgame.name: GRID FORCE - MASK OF THE GODDES
boardgame.description: Heroines of the world, unite! Fight, recruit and evolve more than 35 champions in real-time tactical grid combats, the key to defeating the mad goddesses of Gora.

boardgame.name: Steel Assault
boardgame.description: Steel Assault. Punch, whip, and zipline your way through a post-apocalyptic America in this 16-bit retro-style action platformer!

boardgame.name: Expedition Zero
boardgame.description: Expedition Zero is a survival horror game set in the heart of rural Siberia. Use your engineering skills to confront flesh-eating monsters as the last survivor of a Soviet scientific expedition.

boardgame.name: We Are The Caretakers
boardgame.description: We Are The Caretakers is an afrofuturist sci-fi squad management RPG about protecting endangered animals and your planet from extinction. Recruit, train, manage and build squads of arcane protectors called The Caretakers, after the massive energy barrier that separates you from a wider universe mysteriously falls.

boardgame.name: Coromon
boardgame.description: Coromon brings an immersive storyline, strategic turn-based combat and challenging puzzles to a classic genre. Use powerful moves to take down your opponent's Squad.

boardgame.name: Wave Break
boardgame.description: Wave Break is an arcade-style SKATEboarding BOATING game, with a splash of guns, kickflips and explosions - set in an 80s crime-filled Miami Vice inspired world.

boardgame.name: Renegade Legion: Centurion
boardgame.description:
Centurion is a tactical tabletop miniatures game, where the 75th Century grav-tanks of the mighty human TOG Empire battle the interspecies alliance of the Union and the rebellious, ex-TOG Renegade Legions.

With pre-painted miniatures, a dynamic and intuitive altitude system, and flexible unit management, the ever-shifting battlefields of the 75th Century are yours to command right out of the box. Players new to tabletop wargames and tabletop veterans alike can quickly engage in high-risk, high-reward combat with fresh mechanics that provide clarity and depth.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Godstrike
boardgame.description: GODSTRIKE is a 3D boss rush Bullet Hell based on time. This means that you have to face every Boss and defeat them before your time runs out! Time is money and health, so acquiring abilities or being damaged will reduce your remaining combat time. You better watch out!
